description:
Engineered for long approaches and extended ski tours where both glide and performance are paramount. The next evolution of our STS Tail hardware reduces weight and packable size, increases the adjustable length from 10cm to 20cm, and is field replaceable.

  • Made of 65% mohair that has a plush surface for smooth glide, and 35% nylon for durability
  • Lighter, more supple and packable than full nylon skins
  • Pre-installed tips and STS adjustable tails provide 10-20cm of length adjustment
  • BD Gold Label glue is proven reliable in all conditions and temperatures, and stays sticky season after season
  • Mesh storage bag included
name: Black Diamond Glidelite Mix FL 135mm Skins
